title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit and a deduction for small political contributions.
content: Citizen Involvement in Campaigns Act of 2002 - Permits an individual a tax credit of up to $200 , equal to the verified amount of certain political contributions the individual made during the taxable year. Denies a deduction for any amount taken into account in determining the credit permitted in this Act. Allows a deduction of up to $600 . Allows the deduction whether or not a taxpayer itemizes other deductions.
